create_table1.event_log: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS event_history (date DATETIME DEFAULT (strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', 'now')), type TEXT, command TEXT, subcommand TEXT, action TEXT, token TEXT, from_where TEXT, to_where TEXT, data TEXT);
create_table1.user_history: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_history (date DATETIME DEFAULT (strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', 'now')), id TEXT, action TEXT, etc TEXT);
create_table1.user: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user (date DATETIME DEFAULT (strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', 'now')), id TEXT, preset TEXT, idelete TEXT);
create_table1.user_preset: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_preset (number INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, date DATETIME DEFAULT (strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', 'now')), id TEXT, preset TEXT, data TEXT);

create_table2.log_monitor: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS log_monitor (date DATETIME DEFAULT (strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', 'now')), from_where TEXT, data TEXT);
